item.name: config
item.item: Select Shipping Carriers and Methods to which the rule will be applied. When the shipping carrier is selected all its shipping methods will be also captured. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Define the importance of the rule. The lower the rule priority is, the earlier the rule will be applied in comparison with other rules. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Enable if you want the rule to be applied to all products, including free shipping promo items. Disable if the rule should be applied only for items with non-free shipping. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: tooltip
item.item:
Set condition if you want the rule to be applied after the total weight, quantity or price of selected products reaches the specified value.
Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: tooltip
item.item:
• Set to Replace if you want the original shipping rate to be changed to another value;
  • Set to Surcharge to add the calculated value to the present shipping rate;
  • Set to Discount if you want to deduct the calculated value from the present shipping rate.
  • Set to Partial Replace if you want the original shipping rate to be changed to another value by additional product conditions (mixed cart);

Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Specify the total rate per order. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Specify a fixed rate for each product in the cart. The rate for the whole order will be formed by multiplying the mentioned fixed rate by the number of products in the cart. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Enter the surcharge or discount amount that will be automatically multiplied by the productsâ€™ weight to calculate a shipping rate. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Determine the rate as a percentage of the original cost of products in the cart (the costs are taken without any discounts that might have been applied). Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Specify the percentage that will be automatically added or deducted from the shipping rate. The percentage will be calculated on the original shipping rates basis. If it is 10% and UPS Ground is $25, the total shipping cost will be $27.5. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Set boundary (minimal or maximal) values, for which the original rate can be changed. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Determine boundary (minimal or maximal) values of a shipping rate which can be set after the rule application. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: tooltip
item.item:
The option determines how the rule will work if there are Backorder items in the cart. When it's set to Backorders only, the rule is applied when there are only Backorder items in the cart. With Non backorders, the rule works when there are no Backorder items in the cart. If set to All orders, the rule works regardless of whether there are Backorder items in the cart or not.
Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Enable or disable the rule in the admin area. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Specify the stores where the rule will be applied. Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any store. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: config
item.item: Specify customer groups to which the rule should be applied. Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any group. Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: tooltip
item.item:
Choose certain days of the week and time if you donâ€™t want the rule to be applied 24 hours throughout the week. Leave empty or select all to apply the rule every day.
Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: tooltip
item.item:
If you specify comma separated coupons here, the rule will be activated only when these coupons are entered. For this you need to create a coupon in Marketing / Cart Price Rules area first.
Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: tooltip
item.item:
Works the same as the setting above, but uses the list of coupons in the selected rules instead of a single coupon. You can apply this rule with ANY specified discount rules. Create rule in Marketing / Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule.
Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: tooltip
item.item:
If you specify a comma separated coupons here, the rule will NOT work when these coupons are entered. For this you need to create a coupon in Marketing / Cart Price Rules.
Learn more from the user guide.

item.name: tooltip
item.item:
Works the same as the setting above, but uses the list of coupons in the selected rules instead of a single coupon. You can set NOT to apply this rule with ANY specified discount rules. Create rule in Marketing / Cart Price Rules area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule.
Learn more from the user guide.
